sqlMap.statement:
SELECT ROLE_NM , ROLE_DESC_TXT FROM ( SELECT R.ROLE_NM AS ROLE_NM , R.ROLE_DESC_TXT AS ROLE_DESC_TXT FROM ROLE R WHERE R.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #cMsg.glblCmpyCd#
AND R.ROLE_NM = #cMsg.roleNm_1#
AND R.ROLE_DESC_TXT LIKE #cMsg.roleDescTxt_1#
AND R.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY ROLE_NM ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #rowNum#
